did.unittitle: David L. Cole Report on "Conscious Promotion in Practice of Better Labor-Management Cooperation"
did.abstract: David L. Cole Report to ILO Director David A. Morse on the proposed "conscious promotion in practice of better labor-management cooperation," September 22, 1955.

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives Martin P. Catherwood Library 227 Ives Hall Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183> kheel_center@cornell.edu http://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel-center

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of David L. Cole's Report to ILO Director David A. Morse on the proposed "conscious promotion in practice of better labor-management cooperation," September 22, 1955.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: David L. Cole Report on "Conscious Promotion in Practice of Better Labor-Management Cooperation" #6116m. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
